sentences.en: B : Yes , I am an alumnus of Yale.

sentences.en: If Mary and Bill graduate from our school, she is alumna and he is an alumnus.
sentences.cn: 假如玛莉和比尔从我们学校毕业的话, 那麽她就是女校友,而他则是男校友.

sentences.en: The chief financial officer, Adrian Joseph, is another Lion Brewery alumnus.

sentences.en: The film was shot by an alumnus with a digital camera for a memorial to posterity.
sentences.cn: 此段影片为闻讯而来的校友以相机所拍摄,供后人作为凭吊的纪念物.

sentences.en: The ower was an alumnus from my university.
sentences.cn: 店主是我所在大学的校友.

sentences.en: The rich alumnus endowed the college with half of his fortune.
sentences.cn: 这位富有的校友把其一半的财产捐赠给这所大学.
